City Council District C
=======================

![SMB_4673](http://www.levellandtexas.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6272)

Council Member Jaime McCabe- District C
---------------------------------------

[councilc@levellandtexas.org](mailto:councilc@levellandtexas.org)
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Jaime McCabe was elected to City Council in May of 2024. She is married and has three young children. She is a real estate agent and animal advocate.
